pages.text: Menu COAST Brewing Co. is a small, family owned craft brewery in Charleston, SC. COAST Brewing Company is a family owned craft brewery, on an old Navy base. We make beer we like to drink, simple and done well. We believe in choice organic and local ingredients. But it's not just about being organic, it's a certain mind set of considering the environment in everything we do. In fact, we're not certified organic and have no plans to be-we do it because we believe it's the right thing. All of our ingredients are listed, noting which are organic. Welcome and thanks for your continued support!
